data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Allahabad that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Father, help 1,190 new simple churches start among the 5,954,400 people in the county of Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Allahabad an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 65,498 believers in Allahabad, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the county of Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 5,954,400.

We estimate Allahabad has 65,498 people who might know Jesus, 72,247 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,816,655 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 5,888,902 lost in Allahabad that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
